properties.areaDesc: Patuxent River to Broomes Island MD; Chesapeake Bay from Drum Point MD to Smith Point VA; Chesapeake Bay from North Beach to Drum Point MD; Choptank River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank River; Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA; Tangier Sound and the inland waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 4 at 2:22PM EST until January 5 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Gale Warning overnight and Sunday morning,
increasing northwest winds this evening of 10 to 20 kt and gusts
up to 30 kt will increase after midnight to 15 to 25 kt and
gusts to around 35 kt with waves 2 to 4 feet expected. For the
Small Craft Advisory on Sunday, northwest winds 15 to 20 kt with
gusts up to 30 kt and waves 2 to 4 feet expected.

* WHERE...Chesapeake Bay from North Beach MD to Smith Point VA,
Tidal Potomac from Cobb Island MD to Smith Point VA, Choptank
River to Cambridge MD and the Little Choptank River, Patuxent
River to Broomes Island MD, and Tangier Sound and the inland
waters surrounding Bloodsworth Island.

* WHEN...For the Gale Warning, from 7 PM this evening to 10 AM
EST Sunday. For the Small Craft Advisory, from 10 AM to 6 PM EST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds will cause hazardous waves which could
capsize or damage vessels.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should alter plans to avoid these hazardous conditions.
Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter course, and/or secure the
vessel for severe conditions.

NWSheadline: GALE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM EST SUNDAY... ...SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 6 PM EST SUNDAY
